item.title:
Microsoft Power BI Expert Needed for Data Visualization and Database Setup
 - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Microsoft Power BI expert to assist us in visualizing our data, specifically engineering simulation and test results. The primary tasks will involve creating visually appealing and interactive dashboards that effectively communicate complex data sets. Additionally, we require assistance in setting up a robust database structure to organize our data efficiently. The ideal candidate should possess a strong background in data visualization, have extensive knowledge of Microsoft Power BI, and be proficient in database management. Attention to detail, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work independently are key qualifications for this role.

Skills Needed:
- Microsoft Power BI
- Data visualization
- Database management
- Strong analytical skills

This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months.
We are a tech start-up based in Cambridge; ideally would like to find someone who is able to come into our office occasionally or at least once or twice during the project.

Budget: $106

item.title: ETL  for Amazon Aurora to customer specific databases - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

We are seeking an experienced Data Transfer Specialist to help us migrate data from our Amazon Aurora database to a Power BI-compatible database using a user-friendly ETL platform. Our goal is to extract data specific to a single customer (identified by organisation_id, app_id, or property_id) and ensure seamless integration with Power BI for reporting and analysis.

Responsibilities:

Evaluate and recommend the best UI-based ETL platform (e.g., Fivetran, Talend, Stitch, Matillion, Databricks) for our needs.
Set up and configure the selected ETL platform to connect to our Amazon Aurora database.
Develop and implement data extraction processes to filter and extract data for specific organisation_id, app_id, or property_id.
Transform and load the extracted data into a Power BI-compatible database (e.g., Amazon Redshift, Amazon RDS).
Ensure data integrity and consistency throughout the transfer process.
Create and automate data pipelines to ensure regular data updates.
Provide documentation and training on managing the data pipelines.
Requirements:

Proven experience in data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes.
Familiarity with Amazon Aurora and Power BI-compatible databases (e.g., Amazon Redshift, Amazon RDS).
Experience with UI-based ETL tools such as Fivetran, Talend, Stitch, Matillion, or Databricks.
Strong SQL skills and the ability to write and optimize queries.
Attention to detail and a commitment to data integrity.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with AWS services (e.g., AWS Data Pipeline, AWS Glue).
Previous projects involving data migration and Power BI integration.
Knowledge of best practices in data security and privacy.
Project Details:

Our Aurora database contains 20-30 tables with complex relationships.
Some tables are scoped by organisation_id, app_id, or property_id.
Project Duration: [Specify duration, e.g., 1-2 months]
Location: Remote
Budget: [Specify budget range, e.g., $X,000 - $Y,000]
Start Date: [Specify start date]
Application Process:

Please submit your proposal including:

A brief overview of your experience with similar projects.
Your recommended ETL platform and rationale for choosing it.
An outline of your approach to this project.
Examples of previous work or case studies.
Your availability and estimated timeline for project completion.
We look forward to working with a skilled professional who can help us streamline our data integration process and enhance our reporting capabilities with Power BI.

About Us:

We are a B2B SaaS company specializing in the hospitality tech space. Our platform helps hotels with their customer experience and bringing customer data together. We value innovation, reliability, and excellence in everything we do.



Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 09, 2024 08:51 UTC
Category: Data Extraction
Skills:SQL, ETL, ETL Pipeline, Amazon Web Services
Skills: SQL, ETL, ETL Pipeline, Amazon Web Services
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: PowerBI DashBord  - Upwork
item.description:
Creating Interactive Cumulative Monthly Dashboards

General Requirements:

1. Branches and Self-Service Devices:
   - Number of branches: More than 92 branches.
   - Number of self-service devices: More than 229 devices, some linked to branches and others independent.
   - Number of mobile handheld devices: Around 150 devices, some linked to branches and others independent.

2. Branch and Operator Management:
   - Some branches are managed by operators (not company employees) and are entitled to half the profits after deducting all expenses.
   - All expenses for each branch or device (such as employee salaries, branch or device rental, and operational expenses) should be included in the report I will provide it in a separate Excel file.

3. Financial Support for Branches:
   - Some branches will receive a 30% support from the total operations for the application. This percentage may change from time to time or from branch to branch.
   - Some branches will receive variable financial support to assist the branch should be displayed in the report.  will be provided in a special Excel file.

Report Requirements:

1. Report Format:
   - The report should be comprehensive for each area (a group of branches with self-service devices and handheld devices), for each branch, for each self-service device, and for each handheld device.
   - There should be a filtering option for data by branch, device, or area.

2. Printing Capability:
   - The ability to print reports should be provided.
   - The desired report format will be sent to you later.

Technical Details:

- Interactive Cumulative Dashboards:
  - The dashboard must be interactive and updateable monthly.
  - Display cumulative data for each branch and device.

- Including Expenses and Financial Support:
  - Include all expenses and financial support in separate Excel files and integrate them into the system.



Budget: $100

Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization

item.title: Dashboard development for Family Office reporting - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:

We are looking to develop a comprehensive dashboard using either Power BI or Excel that will serve as a crucial tool for our yearend and mid-year presentations to a family office. This dashboard should integrate financial data, investment insights, returns analysis, net worth tracking, asset allocation visuals, and an editable summary section for customizable reporting.

Key Objectives:
- Create a user-friendly dashboard that provides a clear overview of financial performance and investment status.
- Enable easy comparison of yearend, mid-year, customer period data for presentations.
- Incorporate dynamic features allowing for editing and customisation of summary sections.

Functional Requirements:
1.  Financials Section:
- Display income, expenses, and overall financial health visually.
- Include year-on-year comparisons and trend analysis.
2.  Investments Section:
   - Detailed breakdown of investments across various asset classes (stocks, bonds, real estate, etc.). With editable headers for each asset class.
   - Performance metrics such as ROI, yield, and volatility.
3.  Returns Analysis:
   - Graphical representation of returns from different investments over time.
   - Cumulative returns and performance benchmarks.
4.  Net Worth Tracking:
   - Dynamic charting of net worth evolution.
   - Highlight major contributors (assets) and liabilities affecting net worth.
5.  Asset Allocation:
   - Pie charts or similar visuals showing current asset allocation.
   - Historical changes in asset mix and implications for portfolio strategy.
6.  Editable Summary Section:
   - Customizable text fields or editable tables for entering commentary or specific insights.
   - Ability to update and save changes for different reporting periods.

Technical Specifications:
-  Platform:  Power BI or Excel (Please specify preferred platform or recommend based on project needs).
-  Data Sources:  Excel spreadsheets, CSV files, or direct connections to Xero / Class software.
-  Interactivity:  Filters, slicers, and drill-down capabilities for detailed analysis.
-  Visual Design:  Professional and clean layout with branding elements (logo, color scheme).

Deliverables:
- Fully functional dashboard with interactive elements.
- Calendar function for key dates and payments
- Documentation on how to update data sources and modify/edit the dashboard.
- Training or support as needed for understanding and maintaining the dashboard.


Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00
Posted On: July 09, 2024 05:24 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, API Integration, Dashboard, Presentations, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Financial Analysis
Skills: Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, API Integration, Dashboard, Presentations, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Financial Analysis
Country: Australia

item.title: ChatGPT researcher - Upwork
item.description:
20 hours per week - $400 per month

As a ChatGPT Researcher for SaaS AI Products, your primary focus is on performing deep research using ChatGPT, creating visualizations, and leveraging large language models (LLMs) for reporting and analytics. Your goal is to support the development of cloud solutions and enhance data-driven decision-making processes.

Key Responsibilities:
Deep Research Using ChatGPT:

Extensive Research: Utilize ChatGPT to perform comprehensive research on various topics relevant to SaaS AI products. This includes understanding market trends, technological advancements, competitive analysis, and customer needs.

Data Synthesis: Gather, synthesize, and analyze data from multiple sources to provide actionable insights that can drive business strategies and product development.

Literature Reviews: Conduct thorough literature reviews and summarize key findings from academic papers, industry reports, and other authoritative sources to inform product strategy and development.
Visualization Creation:

Data Visualization: Develop visualizations based on research findings to present data in an easily understandable format.

Storytelling with Data: Create compelling and informative visual representations of complex data sets that tell a story and highlight key insights.

Prototype Development: Develop prototypes of visualizations to be integrated into reports and presentations, ensuring clarity and impact.

LLMs for Reporting and Analytics:

Report Generation: Leverage large language models to generate detailed reports that summarize research findings and provide strategic recommendations. Ensure reports are accurate, comprehensive, and tailored to the needs of different stakeholders.

Analytics Integration: Integrate LLMs into existing analytics workflows to enhance reporting accuracy and efficiency. Use LLMs to automate data extraction, cleaning, and preliminary analysis tasks.

Custom Solutions: Develop custom solutions using LLMs to address specific business needs, such as predictive analytics, sentiment analysis, and trend forecasting.

Support for Cloud Solutions:

Cloud Research: Assist in the research and development of cloud-based solutions for AI products. Evaluate different cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for their suitability in hosting AI solutions.

Infrastructure Recommendations: Provide insights and recommendations to improve cloud infrastructure and performance, ensuring scalability, security, and cost-effectiveness.

Integration Assistance: Support the integration of AI models and data pipelines into cloud environments, collaborating with engineering teams to ensure seamless deployment.
Collaboration and Communication:

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, data science, marketing, and sales, to ensure research aligns with business objectives. Facilitate regular meetings and workshops to discuss research findings and their implications.

Stakeholder Engagement: Communicate research findings and visualizations to stakeholders effectively, using presentations, reports, and interactive dashboards. Tailor communication style to suit technical and non-technical audiences.

Feedback Loop: Establish a feedback loop with stakeholders to refine research methodologies and ensure the continuous relevance of research activities.

Continuous Improvement:

Stay Updated: Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, LLMs, and cloud technologies. Participate in relevant conferences, webinars, and training programs.

Methodology Enhancement: Continuously seek opportunities to improve research methodologies and visualization techniques. Experiment with new tools and approaches to enhance the quality and impact of research outputs.

Best Practices: Develop and document best practices for using ChatGPT and LLMs in research, ensuring consistency and replicability in research processes.

Qualifications:
Experience:

3+ years of experience in research, data analysis, or a related field, preferably with a focus on AI or SaaS products. Experience in using AI tools and models for research purposes is highly desirable.
Education:

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field such as Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline. Advanced degrees (Master's or Ph.D.) are a plus and demonstrate a strong foundation in research methodologies and analytical thinking.
Technical Skills:

Proficiency in using ChatGPT and other LLMs for research and analysis. Familiarity with AI model training, fine-tuning, and deployment is advantageous.
Analytical Skills:

Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights. Strong attention to detail and the ability to think critically and strategically.
Communication Skills:

Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to convey research findings clearly to diverse audiences. Experience in creating reports, presentations, and visualizations that effectively communicate complex concepts.

Tools Proficiency:

Experience with research and visualization tools, as well as cloud platforms and services. Proficiency in using JIRA, Confluence, and other project management tools to coordinate research activities and track progress.

Data Visualization (Plus):

Strong skills in data visualization tools and techniques are a plus. Experience with tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js, as well as proficiency in Python or R for custom visualizations, will be considered an added advantage.

This role focuses on harnessing the power of ChatGPT and LLMs to perform deep research, create insightful visualizations, and support the development of advanced cloud solutions for SaaS AI products.

Budget: $400
Posted On: July 09, 2024 04:19 UTC
Category: Business Analysis & Strategy
Skills:Business Analysis, Product Management, ChatGPT Prompt, Prompt Engineering, Agile Software Development, LLM Prompt Engineering, Requirement Analysis, Implementation Plan, Market Analysis
Skills: Business Analysis, Product Management, ChatGPT Prompt, Prompt Engineering, Agile Software Development, LLM Prompt Engineering, Requirement Analysis, Implementation Plan, Market Analysis
Country: India

item.title: Power Apps Development - Upwork

Key Tasks and Responsibilities:
Requirement Gathering:

Engage with stakeholders to understand business processes and gather detailed requirements for new applications.
Conduct workshops and meetings to capture user needs and document functional requirements.
Application Design:

Create detailed design specifications, including wireframes, user flows, and data models.
Develop user interface (UI) designs that are user-friendly, responsive, and visually appealing.
Development:

Build custom Canvas Apps and Model-Driven Apps using Microsoft Power Apps.
Write and debug Power Fx formulas to implement business logic within the apps.
Integrate Power Apps with data sources such as SharePoint, SQL Server, and Dataverse.
Integration:

Develop workflows and automate processes using Power Automate to enhance app functionality.
Ensure seamless integration of Power Apps with other Office 365 services like Power BI for data visualization and reporting.
Testing:

Perform unit testing and end-to-end testing of Power Apps to ensure they meet requirements and function correctly.
Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues or bugs during the testing phase.
Deployment:

Package and deploy Power Apps solutions in a controlled and systematic manner.
Work with IT teams to manage app environments and ensure proper configuration.
Documentation:

Create comprehensive documentation for developed applications, including technical specifications, user guides, and operational procedures.
Maintain version control and document changes throughout the app development lifecycle.
User Training and Support:

Provide training sessions and create training materials for end-users to facilitate app adoption.
Offer ongoing support and handle user inquiries or issues post-deployment.
Maintenance and Upgrades:

Regularly update and enhance existing Power Apps based on user feedback and changing business needs.
Ensure apps are updated to the latest version of Power Apps and compatible with other integrated systems.
Continuous Improvement:

Stay current with the latest features and updates in the Power Platform ecosystem.
Continuously explore new tools and techniques to improve app development efficiency and effectiveness.

item.description:

Job Summary:
We're hiring a Power  BI Developer with atleast five years of relevant experience to handle Power BI development.

DO NOT APPLY IF:
You want more than $3/h (offers above $3/h will be automatically rejected).
You expect a rate increase after starting (asking for more will automatically end your contract).
You don’t have at least 10 hours a week available regularly (if you are overloaded with work/commute/commitments, DO NOT APPLY).

item.title: Power BI Developer - Upwork
item.description:
I need assistance creating some Power BI reports based on a number of Figma / wireframe designs I have.

The data models, including the various relationships and measures are already done and I will provide these to you in the form of a .pbix file.

The task is to create as many of the wireframes in Power BI as possible.   Most reports will need to be a few pages in length and will typically contain a handful of charts / visuals on each page.

Some creativity will be needed to "fill the blanks" .  ie the wireframes are just based on the first page of the report, so we'll need to generate ideas for the other two pages.  I will assist with this

I need someone who is very familiar with Power BI including features such as drill-through, tooltips, bookmarks etc.  

The key here will be to work at a fast pace and get as many done as possible.  My estimate is that each report should take a few hours.    They don't have to be 100% matching the wireframes, as some elements are not possible.   80% to 90% matching will be good enough but we can discuss that in more detail

Please provide a quote for hourly rate and / or if you prefer a quote per report

Also let me know your availability.

Finally, it's important that I see some examples of your previous work.  So please provide screenshots or links to existing reports that have been published to web



Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00

Category: Data Visualization

The dashboard should present the data in a visually appealing and user-friendly manner, allowing users to easily analyze and interpret the information and be designed for different user personas (management, sales, accounting, customer service).
